Stats.Notes: Max Dex 8, Min Str 12, Fatigues, Full Body, Strength based weapons gain +2 damage

entities.name: GWI HallowMesh
entities.description:
This armor consists of tightly-
woven kinetic fibers that tighten when hit by a fast-
moving object or burst of energy. It is light enough
to be concealed under clothing and is favored by
cyberknights who need to blend in.

Stats.Notes: Max Dex 10, +2 to dodge vs. energy weapons

entities.name: GWI Sanctuary Shield
entities.description:
When activated, this
medium shield generates a plasma field that at
least partially counteracts armor piercing weapons.

Stats.Notes: Min Str 7, Cancels 2 points of AP
Min Str 8, Painful, may ot move and attack unless Strength 10+

entities.name: TL Liberte
entities.description:
This thin layer of clothing is interlaced
with circuitry which creates a field that can ground
electrical shocks, such as those from the Tower of
Babel and Church Police riot sticks. The wearer
does not take additional Shock from Painful
electrical weapons.

Stats.Notes: Can be concealed under clothing, cancels Painful electrical weapons
